title: Inporter does not work. Now what?
content:
I downloaded Thunderbird to a new computer. I put the drive of the OLD computer into an USB drive and plugged it into the new computer. I can browse from the new computer to the OLD drive appdata/roaming/thunderbird without any problem. I launch Thunderbird and created a profile because as far as I know you can't do anything else until a profile has been created.

I launch the importer. I select Thunderbird profile, click next and select the path to the OLD drive where the profile lives. It fails and says something about an error log I can't find.

Take two: I copy the profile folder from the OLD drive to the new computer's desktop. I choose Thunderbird import and I select to use a different folder. I point it to the folders on the NEW computer desktop, and it fails with the same error.

It shouldn't be this difficult. I am pretty sure I am doing something wrong, and if so I need someone to please tell me what. I have time sensitive information in my Thunderbird email. Maybe someone has a "step-by-step" procedure for doing this and can explain it to me like I am 5 years old, I would appreciate it.

Thanks, Peeps
creator: pdxmusicalliance

title: problemi d'invio con thunderbird
content: salve, mi sta capitando spesso di non riuscire ad inviare la posta di tiscali tramite thunderbird per chè mi appare il seguente messaggio: Si è verificato un errore durante l’invio della posta: errore nel server posta in uscita (SMTP). Il server ha risposto: michael.mail.tiscali.it y6tW2B00k2RJKrM01 IP: 185.187.62.112, You are not allowed to send mail. title: Thunderbird отправка извне программы
content: Здравствуйте, такая проблема: допустим на рабочем столе есть вордовский файл, если кликнуть по нему правой кнопкой мыши, в пункте "Отправить" выбрать Thunderbird, то окно создания сообщения с этим вложенным файлом не открывается, а открывается сам документ в ворде. Подскажите, как сделать, чтобы открывалось окно создания сообщения с этим вложенным файлом?
creator: kolyakokhanovich

title: Drag support from thunderbird to firefox on windows
content:
Drag support from thunderbird to firefox has stopped working recently(I mean drag a file to upload in some website for example onedrive or web whatsapp or web telegram) in my windows machine. It was not totally relieble before but at least with a few tries I could do it. I thoutgh that the problem was in the website that I was using. But it appears that the problem resides on thunderbird or firefox because in my Linux machine I have been able to drag in from thunderbird to firefox without problems at all. On another side I have been testing, thunderbird appear to upload without problems files to edge or file explorer, in addition firefox accepts files from the explorer without problems too. And I have been testing with a totally new profile on both, thunderbird and firefox to see if there was problems from some user config.

To sum up, on windows, firefox accepts files from explorer, explorer and MS edge accepts files from thunderbird but directly from thunderbird to firefox is not possible since some update I suppose, before was working but not totally relieble. In Linux I have not problems with wayland enabled on both sides. If you need something more tell me, but I think you shoul reproduce this without problems... It's windows+empty profiles on both sides, thunderbird and firefox...
creator: alberto.gomez3.external

title: Attachment disappears
content: An email will be sent with an attachment. If another participant replies to it, the original email disappears, but then appears in the chat history of the reply, but the attachment no longer appears. It still exists on the server. How can I prevent the attachment from disappearing?
creator: koenig.sel

title: Mail was not downloaded from the server
content:
An important e-mail did not reach me on thunderbird (was also not in the spam folder) . Two weeks later I opened the server an there I found it. On the same day, a little bit later this mail also appeared in the Thunderbird overview of the current day, although the original date (two weeks agog) of receipt was noted. When I opened it again later, the original dispatch date was no longer displayed, but the dispatch date was the day on which it was first displayed in Thunderbird (i.e. the date two weeks later). What is the possible cause

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
creator: koenig.sel

title: Digital signature is invalid
content:
We have imported Ca certificates in trusted and personal certificate in personal store which is used for signing certificate But when received smime for verification with encryption + sign enable getting below error : This message includes digital signature but the signature is invalid. The certificate used to sign the message was issued by a certificate authority that you do not trust for issuing this type of certificate. 2: when encryption is enabled: no error

Certificate used for both encryption and digital signature is same only

Anyone please help why enabling digital signature is leads to failure
creator: pragatietah

title: Use of Apple app-specific password causing problems
content:
I use Thunder bird v.115.8.1 64bit for sending emails. I have several accounts (gmail, apple, talktalk, etc) but the only account that has stopped working for at least a year is the Apple account. It used to be xxxxxx@me.com but now is xxxxxx@icloud.com. I have gone through the instructions both on the Apple site and on your modzilla site several time and it will not allow emails to be sent. Receiving is usually ok, but sending always ends up with messages ranging from "reenter password " to "SMTP server not recognised".

SMTP Settings are currently: email address: myname@icloud.com smtp server: smtp.mail.me.com Port: 587 Connection: SSL/TLS Authentication method:Password User name: myname@icloud.com

IMAP imap.mail.me.com Port:993 Connection: SSL/TLS Authentication method:Password

I suspect it may be the app-specific password that is to blame but it is not possible to check in Apple's site. You can only replace the password and write it down. However the pw is displayed when you check the saved passwords in Thunderbird which I have verified.

Any thoughts?
creator: acc.junk

title: Receiving emails
content:
For the last few days, I am receiving only about 80% of the emails sent to me on my Thunderbird email. I receive the other emails on my ISP Squirrelmail web portal.

I have not set up any message filters on my Thunderbird email.

title: Thunderbird 115.8.1 completely freezes after startup
content:
Hello,

Been using Thunderbird for years without any issues. Since yesterday it simply keeps freezing after startup and checking email. OS OpenSuSE Tumbleweed, Thunderbird 115.8.1.

- Cleaned up the inbox - Started in safe mode - removed add-ons

Nothing worked. Thunderbird simply freezes and has to be killed. In essence it has become unworkable.

What I notice is, I can start Thunderbird without being connected to the internet. It does not freeze. As soon as it starts pulling emails, it then freezes again.

Any hints?

Thank you in advance.

Regards Norbert
creator: norbert69

title: Queria saber como faço para agendar o envio de um e-mail no thunderbird
content: Queria saber como faço para agendar o envio de um e-mail no thunderbird Tem essa opção? Por exemplo, preciso que um e-mail seja mandado em um domingo e hoje é segunda, eu ja deixo ele feito, coloco data e hora e ele envia automaticamente como foi programado, é possível?
creator: alice.toscano

title: clicking urls in a new install of thunderbird does not open anything
content:
My old computer died, so this is a brand new thunderbird install on a brand new computer.

When I click a hyperlink url in an email (or the default welcom window), nothing happens.

I checked that the default web browser was Firefox in windows, but I also changed it to Chrome to give it a kick.

I also went into the advanced preferences to make sure network.protocol-handler.warn-external.http and network.protocol-handler.warn-external.https were set to true (but also checked with false). After each change, I closed TB and relaunched.

Under "Settings", in "Content Type", for http and https, I tried both "Always ask" and "use Firefox (default)". I restarted TB after each change.

I have searched this forum and for some reason, I just cannot find a solution. I would screen capture an error or whatever, but literally nothing happens when I click on any hyperlink.

Any help would be appreciated.
creator: davidstoll+mozillia

title: Folder change icon to letter and can't be moved or edited
content: On Thunderbird 115 64-bit, one of my subfolders under my local folders has changed its icon from folder to letter. Now I can't edit, move or do anything else with it. How do I change it back to the way it was before?

title: LOST EMAILS
content: yesterday afternoon, I noticed a change in my side bar showing the folders. I checked the junk folder, and it was empty. I had left some emails there. I generally have as many as 30 in there some of which get blocked, but some I need. i looked at settings and it was set to delete junk. I changed to move to junk folder. Today, there is nothing in junk. Also, my sent folder is empty. I use that almost daily. I need my emails back.
creator: marymatthewscpa
